an4.169:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dittheva dhamme sasankharaparinibbayi hoti.
an4.169:1.4: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kayassa bheda sasankharaparinibbayi hoti.
an4.169:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dittheva dhamme asankharaparinibbayi hoti.
an4.169:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kayassa bheda asankharaparinibbayi hoti.
an4.169:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo dittheva dhamme sasankharaparinibbayi hoti?
an4.169:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asubhanupassi kaye viharati, ahare patikulasanni, sabbaloke anabhiratisanni, sabbasankharesu aniccanupassi.
an4.169:2.3: Maranasanna kho panassa ajjhattam supatthita hoti.
an4.169:2.4: So imani panca sekhabalani upanissaya viharati—
an4.169:2.8: So imesam pancannam indriyanam adhimattatta dittheva dhamme sasankharaparinibbayi hoti.
an4.169:2.9: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo dittheva dhamme sasankharaparinibbayi hoti.

an4.169:3.8: So imesam pancannam indriyanam mudutta kayassa bheda sasankharaparinibbayi hoti.
an4.169:3.9: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo kayassa bheda sasankharaparinibbayi hoti.

an4.169:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi …pe… pathamam jhanam …pe… dutiyam jhanam …pe… tatiyam jhanam …pe… catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an4.169:4.3: So imani panca sekhabalani upanissaya viharati—
an4.169:4.7: So imesam pancannam indriyanam adhimattatta dittheva dhamme asankharaparinibbayi hoti.
an4.169:4.8: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo dittheva dhamme asankharaparinibbayi hoti.

an4.169:5.3: So imani panca sekhabalani upanissaya viharati—
an4.169:5.6: So imesam pancannam indriyanam mudutta kayassa bheda asankharaparinibbayi hoti.
an4.169:5.7: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo kayassa bheda asankharaparinibbayi hoti.
an4.169:5.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
